definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Please do not use as blurred eyes of looked at me piteously .
sentences.chinese: 請你不要用那樣迷離的眼神可憐巴巴的看着我。

sentences.english: That sorry looking Frozen Yak wasn't completely lost.
sentences.chinese: 那頭看上去可憐巴巴的犛牛並沒有完全輸。

sentences.english: The dog looked up at her appealingly .
The dog looked up at her appealingly.
Five o'clock, I think, " said Dele , plaintively."
sentences.chinese: “大概是五點鐘，”德麗雅可憐巴巴的說。

sentences.english: "Dave my mind is going" HAL says forlornly.
sentences.chinese: “戴夫，我的思想要沒了，”HAL可憐巴巴地說道。

sentences.english: I guess I can squeeze by on this lousy salary.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得靠這點可憐巴巴的工資我還可以勉強度日。
